With help from [[Kurama]], Naruto converts his [[Truth-Seeking Ball]] into a [[Tailed Beast Ball]], and adds [[wind]]-natured [[chakra]] to create the [[shuriken]]-like blades around it before hurling it at the target. The resulting explosion dwarfs that of a regular Tailed Beast Ball and can destroy multiple [[Chibaku Tensei|planetoid-like]] objects in one blast.

== Trivia ==
* In the anime, Naruto was erroneously shown creating seven Tailed Beast Ball Rasenshuriken.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 426</ref> In the manga, he only had six Truth-Seeking Balls with which to create them.
